title: Skin IDEA FOR AMUMU AND BLITZCRANK!!!! SPIDERMAN AMUMU AND VENOM BLITZCRANK
body:
I always say im spiderman when i play amumu when i q at enemies, all the crying reminds me of Tobi Mcquire Spiderman 3.

Seeing some newer spiderman cartoons of venom having some armor built on him like he's a warmachine makes me link Blitzcrank in there, (Since you took back the Sewn Amumu and Blitz) 

The silence that blitz does can be that Venom Tentacool Explosion, and how Venom Snatches people with his symbiote tentacools and stuff

replies.body: One does not simply poke any companies owned by Disney and expect anything good to come from it.
One problem with these types of skins, copyrights. c:
